name: Belly Of The Beast (Demo)
description:
Belly Of The Beast is a 2D platformer game, loosely based on the story of “Little Red Riding Hood”, in which the player controls a young girl in a red hood to guide her through the treacherous belly of the Big Bad Beast in search of her grandmother after they were both swallowed whole.

Created by Ng Kai Yan Credits
